b'Konohakaseki no Natsu': b'One summer day, Rintarou accidentally breaks a Japanese maple leaf fossil treasured by his father. Feeling guilty, he cannot bring himself to tell his father. While at the riverbank looking for fossils, Rintarou meets a boy named Toshi, and their days of adventure begins.\n\nThe film was made by Touko Yatabe for her graduate project at Musashino Art University.'
